title: Drawing, "Design for Hebrew Text for Ark Curtain, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California", 1968–69
medium: Brush and red-brown and dark brown watercolor, black ink on white paper, ruled in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on verso, upper right:  32
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Life size cartoon of partial Hebrew text in three lines with Menorah at lower right.
